To put it simply this game is a fun experience that was tweaked over time, making a great game I recommend all but a few to play. First of all I will address the negative. It can be frustrating trying to communicate with teammates due to the lack of emotes or a proximity chat, this leads to a lack of coordination in solo games. The rank system itself is in need of drastic change as your rank drastically resets on the 13th of every month, this leads to veterans being paired with players who just got the game which is frustrating to many. Perhaps the most common negative reviews are ones from players who feel like venting after losing due to poorly skilled teammates and likely without them knowing it themselves. In my 100+ hours of playing I haven't had connection/latency problems on these dedicated servers so the complaints about peer-to-peer connection is outdated. So, what is the good?

First of all the frustration that is often bred from the games reliance on teammates is crucial to the game as teamwork leads to camaraderie as you work together to escape the killer. It is very satisfying to make a game winning play like saving a survivor from certain death, taunting the killer away from teammates who are working on a generator, opening the gate, or even escaping as the last survivor down the hatch. Your heart will race and it will break, but you are guaranteed to form some memorable moments as both killer hunting down survivors and as survivor making a narrow escape. What else makes this game worth it?

The uniqueness of each character and perks makes the skill ceiling very high. Although the basics can be learned with a quick video, mastering how to manipulate the environment around you to evade the killer or catch a survivor is a constant learning process. On top of this is your decision making as your mind races over what gives you the best chance of victory. 

This game is not for players who rage at every loss, but for those who get satisfaction from doing all they can with the circumstances given to them in each game. I recommend watching a few beginner learning videos before playing, also you should take a break if you are on a losing streak since you'll feel frustration at some point. Enjoy as you form bonds and please the entity. Best of luck!

O jogo contem, quatro sobreviventes (ou survivors) contra um assassino (ou killer), o objetivo dos sobreviventes e reparar 5 geradores, sem tempo limite, o "tempo" da partida e ate repararem todos, e então eles podem abrir um portão que e aonde eles escapam, e a outra forma e o assassino matando todos, pelo preço vale muito a pena, vou logo avisando que e viciante quando vc consegue "loopa" o assassino, e vc nunca mais quer para.

I originally made a review saying how good this game is and how there is something for everyone put into this game. But, as f the new patch release. I realized that the Developers behind this game are just out for money and only care about their cosmetic sales. They don't listen to their community and could careless about the player base. I was banned on my first account for editing my save files to have my progress from Xbox back onto PC when I made the switch to PC, simply for the fact that this game is so grindy and it would literally take a year for me to get back to where I was, all of this could've been avoided if they implemented Cross-Progression. But, there are literally survivor mains out there who access the Dev Builds to change their corn map textures to be small plants, play on stretched resolutions, and make their cosmetics different colors. Which is more concerning than me getting my progress back. Yet no actions towards those people are taken. I would not recommend this game in its current state and with the devs current mind set towards us, the players.

This game is really really fun. It mixes innovative survival mechanics and (mostly) great characters and the introduction of perks can change your entire playstyle, thus providing a non-repetitive experience for the player. BUT if you are looking to play a horror game this game isn't made for you, even tho it has scary characters it's just not a horror game.

In summary, I strongly recommend this game. Play it with friends. Mess around with the killers. Have fun.
